title: Christophe Galtier - Wikipedia
snippet: On 5 July 2022, Galtier agreed a two-year deal to become the manager of Ligue 1 champions Paris Saint-Germain, replacing Mauricio Pochettino. In his first transfer window, he oversaw the arrivals of Hugo Ekitike, Nordi Mukiele, Fabián Ruiz, Renato Sanches, Carlos Soler, and Vitinha.

title: PSG sack Galtier despite winning Ligue 1, appoint Luis Enrique as new coach | Reuters
snippet: Ligue 1 champions Paris St Germain sacked manager Christophe Galtier on Wednesday, bringing the curtain down on a tumultuous campaign under the Frenchman and replaced him with former Barcelona and Spain coach Luis Enrique.

title: PSG fires coach Christophe Galtier and replaces him with Luis Enrique | FOX Sports
snippet: Paris Saint-Germain has fired Christophe Galtier after a disappointing season and hired former Spain and Barcelona manager Luis Enrique.

title: Christophe Galtier leaves Paris Saint-Germain ahead of Luis Enrique appointment - The Athletic
snippet: Christophe Galtier has left his role as head coach of Paris Saint-Germain after one year in charge. Luis Enrique is set to be appointed later today to replace him. PSG announced Galtier’s departure on Wednesday, saying they had “decided” ...

title: PSG appoint Enrique as new coach to replace Galtier | Reuters
snippet: Paris St Germain have appointed former Barcelona and Spain coach Luis Enrique as their new manager on a two-year contract after the Ligue 1 champions parted ways with Christophe Galtier earlier on Wednesday.
